Description: Records, products and/or outputs available from systematic surveys, and/or with qualified observers/personnel, including records vetted through peer-review processes.
Usage: These records are high quality, and come from reliable sources. Using this source is recommended.

Description: Records, products and/or outputs available from a mix of opportunistic and systematic surveys. Some quality control has been applied, although additional work is required to verify information.
Usage: Use with caution and, where possible, validate inference with data assigned to the High Quality tier.

Description: Primarily opportunistic surveys that have not been through a quality control process, or results of invalidated models. Data quality protocols and validation are required.
Usage: Use only if data in High/Medium tiers confirms or validates information from this tier.
